item.title: Ann Coulter Says GOP Should Give In On Taxes: 'We Lost The Election'
item.description: Ann Coulter says GOP should cave to Obama: 'we lost the election' http://t.co/Om5SzhOY
item.content:encoded: Ann Coulter says GOP should cave to Obama: 'we lost the election' http://t.co/Om5SzhOY Ann Coulter shocked Sean Hannity on Wednesday when she conceded that she thinks Republicans should let tax rates for the rich go up. House Republicans are currently battling President Obama over whether or not to hike taxes on the top 2 percent of earners in the negotiations over the so-called "fiscal cliff." Link - Trackbacks
